title: Chris Pratt on The Terminal List's Authenticity to Navy SEALs and Garfield's Star-Studded Cast
user: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon

meta.description:
Chris Pratt talks about wanting to make The Terminal List as authentic to real life as possible, his daughter saying "no" to him all the time and working with Samuel L. Jackson, Cecily Strong, Snoop Dogg and more in Garfield.
 
Garfield releases in theaters May 24, tickets are available now: http://bit.ly/GetGarfieldTickets
